name: Classic Movies of World War II Online Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: John Wayne always seemed to be winning World War II. Which of the following is NOT one of his World War II movies?
questions.explanation:
Dark Command.

	That one was about Quantrill's Raiders in the Civil War. 'Iwo' may be his best-known WW II movie.

questions.text: Which of these movies is set during WWII?
questions.explanation:
A Bridge Too Far.

	'York' and 'Glory' are set in WWI. 'Pork Chop' is set during the Korean War. 'Bridge' is an all-star epic (similar to 'Longest Day') about WWII.

questions.text: 'Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo' featured the legendary Spencer Tracy portraying the legendary Jimmy Dolittle. Tracy, however, wasn't the star of the movie. Who was?
questions.explanation:
Van Johnson.

	His big WW II movie. Niven and Quinn were in 'Guns of Navarone'.

questions.text: 'The Best Years of Our Lives' is about the period after the end of WW II. Who was NOT in the movie?
'The Story of GI Joe' was a turning point in the career of this up-and-coming actor.
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum.

	A star-making vehicle for young Mitchum. Holden was in 'Bridge Over The River Kwai'.

questions.text: 'Command Decision' featured Clark Gable in one of his better roles. What branch of the service did he command?
questions.explanation:
Air Force Bombers.

	Dangerous bombing missions.

questions.text: 'Up Periscope' starred which of these actors?
questions.explanation:
James Garner.

	Curtis was in 'The Outsider' about one of the soldiers who hoisted the flag at Iwo Jima.

Errol Flynn.

	Lancaster was in 'The Train'.

questions.text: 'The Young Lions' starred all of the following EXCEPT:
questions.explanation:
Frank Sinatra.

	Sinatra was in 'Von Ryan's Express'. Brando played a {Nazi;} Martin and Clift were American soldiers.

questions.text: 'For Whom The Bell Tolls' isn't technically a World War II movie. In what conflict is the Gary Cooper character engaged?
questions.explanation:
Spanish Civil War.

	From the Hemingway novel in the days before WW II started.
